name: process_thermal_mass_partition_wall

arguments.name: selectedliving
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the living space

arguments.name: selectedfbsmt
arguments.display_name: Of what space type is the finished basement

arguments.name: selectedpartitionwallmass
arguments.display_name: Partition wall massFor manually entering partition wall mass properties, leave blank

arguments.name: userdefinedpartitionwallfrac
arguments.display_name: Ratio of exposed partition wall area to total conditioned floor area and accounts for the area of both sides of partition walls

arguments.name: userdefinedlivingarea
arguments.display_name: The area of the living space

arguments.name: userdefinedfbsmtarea
arguments.display_name: The area of the finished basement

modeler_description: This measure creates constructions representing the internal mass of partition walls in the living space and finished basement. The constructions are set to define the internal mass objects of their respective spaces.
description: This measure creates internal mass for partition walls in the living space and finished basement.
